The Purpose Of The Agricultural Overlay District Is to Retain Large Tracts Of Undeveloped, Open Land In Areas Identified As Having A High Resource Value For Agriculture. This Overlay District Will Preserve Open Space And Prevent The Fragmentation Of Land Into Parcels Too Small to Farm.
